name: Hazbin Hotel District
description: Charlie's domain. A beacon of hope in Hell, where redemption is more than a dream. Peaceful streets, bright colors, and the sound of music.

name: Cannibal Colony
description: Rosie's sophisticated society of flesh-eaters. Victorian elegance masks primal hunger. Politeness is paramount, but so is the menu.

name: Entertainment District
description: Valentino's pleasure palace. Neon lights, dark alleys, and darker deals. Where vice is virtue and everything has a price.

name: Vox Tower Zone
description: The media empire's heart. Screens everywhere broadcast Vox's influence. Technology and propaganda in perfect synthesis.

name: Industrial Hellscape
description: Carmilla Carmine's weapons forge. Smoke, steel, and suffering. Where angelic steel is forged and deals are hammered out.

name: Overlord Territories
description: Contested lands ruled by powerful overlords. Alastor's domain borders here. Danger, opportunity, and raw power converge.

name: Royal Quarter
description: Hell's aristocracy. Lucifer's palace looms. Only the powerful dare enter. Where bloodlines and power define worth.
